message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As a valued potential buyer, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $1,500,000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product.  This is still a good deal for you, and it gets us closer to an agreement.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept your offer of $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1,300,000. This is still a significant discount from the original price, and I believe it's a fair compromise. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1,150,000.  This would be a great deal for both of us. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not ready to accept your offer of $1,150,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1,250,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I understand your position, but $1,250,000 is still more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe it's a good deal considering the value of the product.  Let's close this deal!

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm still not ready to accept your offer of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1,225,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to keep negotiating.  I'm willing to go up to $1,210,000.  This is a great deal for both of us, and it gets us very close to a deal.  Let's make this happen!

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not ready to accept your offer of $1,210,000. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer the product to you for $1,220,000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
